availableValues: Field {property} must be one of the allowed values: {values}.
email: Field {property} must be a valid email address.
id: Field {property} must be a valid identifier.
uuid: Field {property} must be a valid UUID.
jwt: Field {property} must contains a valid token.
integer: Field {property} must be an integer number.
min: Field {property} must not be less than {value}.
max: Field {property} must be less or equals to {value}.

otp.length: Field {property} must be exactly {length} digits long.

password.digit: Field {property} must contains at least one digit.
password.lowercase: Field {property} must contains at least one lowercase letter.
password.uppercase: Field {property} must contains at least one uppercase letter.
password.special: Field {property} must contains at least one special character.

length.exact: Field {property} must be exactly {length} characters long.
length.range: Field {property} must be between {min} and {max} characters long.
length.min: Field {property} must be at least {min} characters long.
